html: The #SOTU is rooted in our nation's Constitution, which states that the President "shall from time to time give to the Congress Information of the State of the Union, and recommend to their Consideration such measures as he shall judge necessary and expedient.”

html: Today, while 1000s stand up for #ProLife values, I reaffirm my commitment to pro-life causes. In the 116th Congress so far I have: • Rejoined the #ProLife Caucus • Sponsored a bill to defund Planned Parenthood • Sponsored a bill to ban abortions after a detectible heartbeat
text:
Today, while 1000s stand up for #ProLife values, I reaffirm my commitment to pro-life causes. In the 116th Congress so far I have:
• Rejoined the #ProLife Caucus
• Sponsored a bill to defund Planned Parenthood
• Sponsored a bill to ban abortions after a detectible heartbeat

It is time we win the fight for border security, and I stand with @POTUS as we work to resolve this national security crisis.https://yellowhammernews.com/byrne-writes-letter-to-trump-praising-border-security-speech/ …
